alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 15 at 2:13PM AKST until December 17 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...South winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Areas of blowing snow will reduce visibility to 1 mile or less at times. The strong winds will blow the recent heavy snowfall around and cause snow drifts to form across the Richardson Highway in some locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There will be a lull in the winds early Saturday morning before increasing again Saturday afternoon.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp
